meanings.sent1: The lighted candle flickered in the dark room.
meanings.sent2: The room was bright and lighted by the morning sun.
meanings.sent3: The lighted lantern led the way through the spooky forest.
meanings.sent4: Her face was lighted up with joy when she saw the surprise.
meanings.sent5: The lighted sign outside the store attracted customers from afar.

meanings.sent1: He lighted the campfire with a match.
meanings.sent2: The fireworks lighted up the night sky with colors.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally lighted the wrong end of the candle.
meanings.sent4: The arsonist lighted multiple buildings in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The torch was lighted to guide the path through the cave.

meanings.sent1: The lighted load was easier to carry up the hill.
meanings.sent2: After sharing his worries, he felt more lighted in spirit.
meanings.sent3: The lighted backpack allowed him to move swiftly through the crowd.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt lighted after forgiving her friend.
meanings.sent5: The lighted workload gave her more time to relax in the evenings.
